item.description:
Speaker: Allan Hughes, DC
Meditation isn’t just relaxation and stress relief. Mystics throughout the ages have turned to meditation to seek insights into the profound questions of life: who are we really, and what is the true purpose of our life? Mystics didn’t all live ages ago. Through the power of meditation, even in today’s upside-down world, you can become a modern mystics. This program will include Jyoti meditation instructions (meditation on the inner Light) and time for meditation.
(Free on-street parking. Please do not park in driveway.)

group.name: The Science of Spirituality Meditation Meetup

item.name: Meditation for Mystics
